document_data.name: Hakeashar
document_data.distinctions: Red, misty appearance, with claws, eyes and fangs
document_data.mainbody: A '''hakeashar''' was a type of [[nishruu]], similar to them in many ways.
document_data.Description:
They were a subspecies of nishruu and found in the [[Old Empires]] of [[Mulhorand]], [[Unther]], and [[Chessenta]]. They were identical with nishruus in almost every way except for their appearance.

Hakeashars had hundreds of grasping claws, piercing eyes and outstretched fanged mouths among the globular blood-red mist. Thus, hakeashars had a more horrific appearance and thus naturally could fill their foes with horror.
document_data.Combat: Hakeashars were slightly more powerful than their nishruu cousins: they had more powerful attacks, higher health, and immunity to standard weapons. Thus, it required a more powerful mage to summon one.
